text: Antonio Ortega Franco (22 December 1941 - 1 February 2022) was a Mexican Roman Catholic prelate. He was born in Empalme Escobedo, Mexico. Ortega Franco was made a priest in 1968. He was the auxiliary bishop of México between 2004 until 2019. Ortega Franco died on 1 February 2022 in Mexico City, aged 80.México: falleció el obispo Antonio Ortega Franco, con fama de santidad ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Mexican Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Mexico City
title: Antonio Ortega Franco
